alert.note: Alert for Bergen; Hudson (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 02 at 6:02PM EDT until June 02 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Upton NY has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Hudson County in northeastern New Jersey... Eastern Bergen County in northeastern New Jersey... Southern Westchester County in southeastern New York... Queens County in southeastern New York... Bronx County in southeastern New York... Kings County in southeastern New York... Rockland County in southeastern New York... New York (Manhattan) County in southeastern New York... Northwestern Nassau County in southeastern New York... * Until 700 PM EDT. * At 602 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Hawthorne, or near Tarrytown, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Nyack around 605 PM EDT. Tarrytown and Orangeburg around 610 PM EDT. Tappan around 615 PM EDT. White Plains and Port Chester around 620 PM EDT. Scarsdale around 625 PM EDT. Yonkers and Rye around 630 PM EDT. New Rochelle and Riverdale around 635 PM EDT. Co-op City and City Island around 640 PM EDT. East Tremont and Sands Point around 645 PM EDT. Mott Haven and Throgs Neck Bridge around 650 PM EDT. Great Neck and Laguardia Airport around 655 PM EDT. Jamaica and Flushing around 700 PM EDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
